name: search
description: Search files by pattern and content

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Search for files matching a glob pattern (e.g., '**/*.ts', 'src/**/*.json')

cwd.description: Base directory to search from (default: current directory)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100)

tools.name: grep_content
tools.description: Search for text content within files

pattern.description: Text or regex pattern to search for

cwd.description: Base directory to search from (default: current directory)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of matches to return (default: 50)
